title: Spicy Sichuan Cucumber
ingredients: ['1 cucumber (Chinese or salad cucumber)', '4 or 5 dried red chillies', '1 spring onion', '1 large clove of garlic', '1/2 teaspoon of brown sugar', '5 teaspoons of soy source (dark or light)', '3 teaspoons of sesame oil', '2 teaspoons of peppercorn chilli oil', 'Â¼ teaspoon of Chinese black vinegar', '1/2 teaspoon of white toasted sesame seed']
